title: Research @nuxtjs/supabase 2.0 breaking changes
description:
Investigate breaking changes between @nuxtjs/supabase 1.5.3 and 2.0.3.

Tasks:
- Review changelog and migration guide
- Document API changes in composables (useSupabaseClient, useSupabaseUser, etc.)
- Check if auth callback handling changed
- Note any config format changes in nuxt.config

Output: Create research note in .tick/ with findings.
acceptance_criteria: Research document created with all breaking changes documented
